headline: AEP Reports First-Quarter 2025 Earnings, Reaffirms Guidance
summary: American Electric Power (Nasdaq: AEP) today reported first-quarter 2025 earnings, prepared in accordance with Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP), of $800 million or $1.50 per share, compared with GAAP earnings of $1,003 million or $1.91 per share in first-quarter 2024. Operating earnings for first-quarter 2025 were $823 million or $1.54 per share, compared with operating earnings of $670 million or $1.27 per share in first-quarter 2024.
